title: Google Ads Users Targeted in Malvertising Scam Stealing Credentials and 2FA Codes
description: Cybersecurity researchers have alerted to a new malvertising campaign that's targeting individuals and businesses advertising via Google Ads by attempting to phish for their credentials via fraudulent ads on Google.
